name: Adam and Eve: The Game - Chapter 1
description: In the beginning everything was good... So what went wrong? Adam and Eve: The Game - Chapter 1, is the first chapter of 2D platform game that retells the biblical story of Adam and Eve. After Adam wake up and notice the lack of Eve, he begins a journey through paradise in search of his mate.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 Процессор: Intel Core 2 Duo E4400 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon64 X2 3800+ 2.0 GHz Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: NVIDIA GeForce GT 220 or ATI Radeon HD 4600 (1 GB) DirectX: Версии 9.0c Место на диске: 250 MB

reviews.review_text: The main game play concern when making a platformer are the controls. This game has horrible controls and a very questionable collision detection. Couldn't bring myself to even collect the first 100 'things' to get anywhere in the game. Just don't bother with this game.
i could not face the boss chapter 1
